import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import ProgressTracker from '../components/ProgressTracker'; const About = () => { const teamMembers = [ { name: 'Sarah Johnson', role: 'Founder & CEO', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b786?w=400&h=400&fit=crop&crop=face', bio: 'Passionate about community development and civic engagement.', social: { linkedin: '#', twitter: '#', email: 'sarah@civicaid.com' } }, { name: 'Michael Chen', role: 'CTO', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=400&h=400&fit=crop&crop=face', bio: 'Technology enthusiast focused on building scalable solutions.', social: { linkedin: '#', twitter: '#', email: 'michael@civicaid.com' } }, { name: 'Emily Rodriguez', role: 'Head of Community', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=400&h=400&fit=crop&crop=face', bio: 'Dedicated to fostering strong community relationships.', social: { linkedin: '#', twitter: '#', email: 'emily@civicaid.com' } }, { name: 'David Kim', role: 'Lead Developer', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=400&h=400&fit=crop&crop=face', bio: 'Full-stack developer with a passion for user experience.', social: { linkedin: '#', twitter: '#', email: 'david@civicaid.com' } } ]; const milestones = [ { year: '2020', title: 'Founded', description: 'CivicAid was born from a vision to improve community engagement' }, { year: '2021', title: 'First Launch', description: 'Launched in 3 cities with 1000+ active users' }, { year: '2022', title: 'Expansion', description: 'Expanded to 15 cities with 50,000+ users' }, { year: '2023', title: 'Innovation', description: 'Introduced AI-powered issue detection and smart routing' }, { year: '2024', title: 'Future', description: 'Planning to reach 100+ cities globally' } ]; const values = [ { icon: '🤝', title: 'Community First', description: 'We believe in putting community needs at the heart of everything we do.' }, { icon: '🚀', title: 'Innovation', description: 'Constantly innovating to provide better solutions for civic issues.' }, { icon: '🔍', title: 'Transparency', description: 'Open and transparent communication with all stakeholders.' }, { icon: '🌱', title: 'Sustainability', description: 'Building solutions that last and benefit future generations.' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
🏛️

About CivicAid

We're on a mission to transform how communities report, track, and resolve civic issues. Our platform connects citizens, volunteers, and local authorities to create better neighborhoods.

{/* Mission & Vision */}
🎯

Our Mission

To empower communities by providing a modern, efficient platform for civic engagement. We believe every citizen should have a voice in improving their neighborhood, and every issue should be addressed promptly and transparently.

🔮

Our Vision

A world where every community has the tools and resources to maintain beautiful, safe, and well-functioning neighborhoods. We envision cities where civic engagement is seamless, efficient, and rewarding for everyone involved.

{/* Values Section */}

Our Values

{values.map((value, index) => (
{value.icon}

{value.title}

{value.description}

))}
{/* Journey Timeline */}

Our Journey

{milestones.map((milestone, index) => (
{milestone.year}

{milestone.title}

{milestone.description}

))}
{/* Team Section */}

Meet Our Team

{teamMembers.map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.bio}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Join Our Mission

Ready to make a difference in your community? Start using CivicAid today and help us build better neighborhoods together.

Get Started Contact Us
); }; export default About;
